TRUSTED EXPERTS IN CONCRETE & LANDSCAPING

With over 15 years of experience, Rocky Concrete is your trusted partner for high-quality concrete and landscaping services in Bakersfield and surrounding areas.

As a family-operated business, we prioritize customer satisfaction, delivering exceptional results in every project. From driveways and patios to custom outdoor kitchens, fire pits, and comprehensive landscaping solutions, our expert team transforms outdoor spaces with precision and care.

OUR SERVICES

CONCRETE WORK

Driveways, patios, walkways & flatwork

OUTDOOR LIVING

Outdoor kitchens & covered patios

POOLS & SPAS

Remodeling & spa installations

FIRE FEATURES

Fire pits, fireplaces & chimneys

LANDSCAPING

Turf, gardens & water features

IRON WORK

Gates, railings & decorative metalwork
